reviews.sentence: Staff was all very friendly the common areas were all beautiful and they had 2 drinks per room key per day no one does that. And parking was free. Also everything is close byrestaurants mall grocery stores. Room also had a fridge And microwave. Wifi is not free although they comped it for us which was nice.

it is ok but too high priced for bad furniture. The breakfast evening drinks snacks are nice. Very welcoming. The sofa was dirty Olson nasty. The mattress on sofa bed was badly stained n had some bug on it my grandkids got bites n we were all itching hope they not bed bugs. I did complain but they stated they had no other mattress. The kind bed looked like a queen the bed was uncomfortable the pillows were terrible n flat they hurt.

Disappointed. Me as a Hilton Gold Member usually stay in hotels of the Hilton family group and I always had a pleasant stay in any property. That s the reason I chose his hotel. But this time I had a really bad experience. After a long drive from Las Vegas we just wanted to get to our beds as fast as possible. Ok Check In was fast but cold and no one helped us with our luggage or did not even ask us for help. On the way to our room we felt like being in prison. Dirty dishes everywhere in front of the rooms and you just have a bad feeling walking there. From every room you have a window to the hallway and the lobby. The room suite itself was nothing special. Small bathroom and old dark furniture. Two of us had to sleep on the sofa bed which was the most uncomfortable night ever furthermore the bed blankets were used and full of hair. so we asked for new one. Breakfast. Youth hostel standardThe next day we checked out immediately and moved to the Hilton Woodland Hills which was really nice.

My stay. The refrigerator was not working in the room the room was not up to my expectations since they just recently went under remodeling. The room was and what I had expected I have stayed at on the other Embassy suites LAX softener Anaheim and this is poor quality.

I really liked this hotel and for many reasons. First of all I booked this hotel because it was close to a bar I wanted to visit. I had seen the bar on YouTube and came all the way from Chicago to try it out. This hotel was literally a 5 minute walk from the bar. So I was extremely pleased with that. Second the hotel has a lot of parking. Especially in the front which is ideal because that is usually where the cameras are located. So every time we parked our car it would be very close to the front doors of the hotel. Third the hotel staff was very nice and helpful. I had very many questions and they always greeted me with a smile. Fourth the hotel itself is beautiful. It looks upscale without the upscale prices. We took very many photos in the lobby at the restaurants in the middle fountain sections on the lounge sections. The grandmas were so excited. Fifth the hotel comes with a nice size indoor pool. Sixth the room itself was a very affordable suite. At any other hotels we would have had to pay for two rooms and this was a two room suites just a little bit above other hotel one room prices. I was very pleased. The size was fantastic and the beds were comfortable. The living room in my suites came with a dining table that allowed us to all eat comfortably together and the room came with two easily to use TVs. Yes I said easy to use. I was in Las Vegas at a 4 star hotel and the TVs would not even power on or change channels without pressing firmly on the control and getting it close to the TV. That was not the case here. The TVs were modern and easy to use with many channels. Our room also came with snacks and my kids were jumping of joy. We also took these snacks back with us to the airport. We enjoyed them very much. Seventh the hotel comes with a breakfast buffet that features good hours. Unlike other hotels where the buffet is 630 8 this one was actually 7 10. We enjoyed the breakfast choices very much and the seating area was very large. I can not remember what else we loved about this hotel but I do remembered we enjoyed every bit of it. If we ever go back to Downey we will definitely be staying at this hotel again. ps. They took a 50 deposit from me and released it within 5 business days.

Location was the perfect spot on a main Street that was easily accessible. The service was great and very helpful. Not to mention they were very nice and polite people. The rooms were very homey and were not in any way uncomfortable.

Quick trip. Felt extremely comfortable at the hotel. This hotel has paid attention to the little details. The staff treat their guests like family. The amenities were well maintained. I was super impressed with all the new and modern decor in their renovated rooms. They did a great job reinvesting in their product. While there are many places you will be very happy with staying at the Embassy Suites Los Angeles Downey.

Just an OK location might be better after renovations. The property is undergoing a renovation to update the hotel we were in an updated room and it was very nice comfortable bed great amenities. Breakfast was pretty good for a typical Embassy Suites although there were some issues with getting the correct thing. The shower was updated nicely with just a shower which is preferred as most hotels are small areas. The hotel staff also texted us to stay in contact and was helpful with the premium options and not being coke fans. Now for the BAD parking was a nightmare. There is a theater next door and had an event there when we arrived along with people taking the furniture that the hotel was getting rid of taking up more spaces we circled the parking lot for 30 minutes until we finally went in to complain the front desk staff acted like we were causing them an inconvenience. The bathroom for a premium suite was also SUPER small to the point you could not close the door while sitting on the toilet and could not fit 2 adults in there.

The room I requested was not available at the time of check in. Total of 5 in a room with 1 King size bed and a pull out couch with 1 pillow and blanket in the closet. Ordered pillows through housekeeping and four pillows were brought to the room with no pillow cases. The maid cleaned the room and only left two towels for a party of five. The hotel is clean. Continental breakfast was good. The pool was very cloudy.

This is the worst embassy suites ever. The check in staff was rude and refused to give us our Hilton honors award points because we booked through a third party and they refused to give us the wifi code for the same reason. Half of the elevators were out of order. We had only one Kleenex in the box. The light sensor switches did not work in the bathroom. The balcony door would not lock. The toilet paper dispencer was broke. Save yourself a ton of money and stay at motel 6 where you only expect a bed and a bath.
Wonderful. Clean room updated decor. Elevator out of service whole time we stayed.
Has two rooms great pool great food and there is even a bolcony.

I highly recommend Embassy Suites by Hilton at Downey California. I am from Miami called their Sales Office Spoked to Lorena. She was extremely Professional helpful. My nephew Is still staying there since he is Participating in a Medical Trial. His Experience is very positive. The Hotel staff Is very attentive very clean very nice Breakfast. Great experience.
A nice place to stay has a pool. Suites have 2 large screen tvs. 2 queen beds and the coach pulls out. You could sleep six.
This is one of the best hotel I have been in. It has every from courteous front counter peopleThank you Harleyto and great bar to excellent rooms.

21th Birthday Stay Stayed At The Embassy Suites For My Son ’s 21th Birthday. He Had A Blast. Thank You All For Making It Happened. Our Cleaning Lady Maria Was Super Nice And Wonderful To Us. She Would Really Make Our Day. To All The Staff We Thank You Guys.

While the front desk receptionist was nice at checkin the hotel put us in a room directly under the elevator engine. COULD NOT SLEEP ALL NIGHT. It shook every time someone would use it. There was also a party door which also made it impossible to sleep. The noise did not stop till around 2 am. The walls are very thin. Do not stay in room 21. We were hoping to get a good night sleep after a long day of travels and chose this hotel because of their suites. After telling the receptionist in the morning we just got a discarded apology. It would have been a little better if the hotel would have warned us or know not to put their guests in that room. NEVER COMING BACK.

Great stay for business close to freeway for travel to meetings many food options available close by. Central location to attend meetings at other locations freeway friendly breakfast was quick and great the room was clean updated decorations front desk staff was polite and knowledgeable. Great check out.
Awesome hotel. Staff was amazing room was perfect and large. could not find a single negative thing to day about this place. Will definitely return here in the future.
Conference rooms are big and staff was great.
